mapper.update: update status set request_cancel=1 where request_nm_status =#{requestNm};
update status set quotation_cancel=1 where quotation_nm =#{quotationNm};
update status set request_ok=1 where quotation_nm =#{quotationNm};
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, s.* FROM request r JOIN status s ON r.request_id = s.request_id WHERE r.request_id = #{requestId} GROUP BY s.request_nm_status ORDER BY s.request_nm_status desc;
SELECT q.*, s.* FROM quotation q JOIN status s ON q.quotation_nm = s.quotation_nm WHERE q.keynum = #{id} ORDER BY s.request_nm_status DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE status s JOIN request r ON s.request_nm_status= r.request_nm JOIN company c ON c.key_num = r.keynum_com JOIN member m ON m.id = c.id SET s.company_name = m.user_nm WHERE r.request_nm = #{requestNmStatus};
update status set payment_ok = true where quotation_nm = #{quotationNm}
update status set refund = true where quotation_nm = #{quotationNm}
